text: ettaṉaiyō iṟaittūtarkaḷum, avarkaḷuṭaṉ iṟaivaṉiṉ pala nallaṭiyārkaḷum cērntu (allāhviṉ pātaiyil) pōr purintirukkiṉṟaṉar. Avarkaḷ allāhviṉ pātaiyil (pōr ceytataṉāl) taṅkaḷukku ēṟpaṭṭa ciramattiṉ kāraṇamāka avarkaḷ taṅkaḷ tairiyattai iḻantiṭavumillai; palavīṉamākiviṭavumillai; (etirikaḷukku) paṇintuviṭavumillai. (Ivvāṟu ciramaṅkaḷaic) cakittuk koḷpavarkaḷaittāṉ allāh nēcikkiṟāṉ
